pinyin: E4 er3 duo1 si1 Gao1 yuan2

definition: abbr. for Hubei Province 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] in central China/surname E
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: The vegetation of the Ordos Plateau is rare, but the species of grasshopper is higher than Shaanbei Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 鄂爾多斯高原植被稀少，蝗蟲物種卻較陝北高原豐富。
